entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
